data.title: Person: Arun Nayar
data.meta_description: Person: Arun Nayar: A comprehensive series of articles on this topic
data.text:
Elizabeth Hurley no longer cares what people think, but is taking more of her appearance than ever to avoid "looking like a bag lady".

FORMER Aussie cricket star Shane Warne has confirmed he has split from his wife amid reports linking him to model Liz Hurley.

Former Aussie cricket star Shane Warne has confirmed he has split from his wife amid reports linking him to model Liz Hurley.

The 45-year-old beauty Elizabeth Hurley has a soft spot for the 22-year-old screen heartthrob Zac Efron, admitting Efron brings out the “cougar” in her – a reference to women who like younger men.

Hugh Grant and his ex-girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley have won £58,000 (€73,000) in damages for invasion of privacy, after they were photographed on holiday in a private resort in the Maldives.

Elizabeth Hurley has sparked rumours she's pregnant with her second child after trying to cover up "a little bump" at a Breast Cancer Research Foundation event in New York last week.

British model/actress Elizabeth Hurley and her husband Arun Nayar have settled an unfair dismissal lawsuit filed against them by their former maid, who claimed she was paid just $2.40 (€1.63) an hour.

Millionaire couple Liz Hurley and Arun Nayar were accused of “penny pinching” today after failing to make a donation to the country parish which hosted their star-studded wedding seven months ago.

Newlywed Elizabeth Hurley made time on her honeymoon to work on her career.

Elizabeth Hurley's father-in-law will testify in court against the actress/model on charges of mocking Hinduism during her wedding to Arun Nayar.

MODEL Elizabeth Hurley has not got off to a good start with her new father-in-law — he has offered to testify against her on charges of mocking Hinduism, a lawyer in the case said yesterday.

A Hindu religious activist has filed a complaint in a western Indian court saying that Elizabeth Hurley and Arun Nayar’s Hindu wedding made a “mockery of Hindu customs”, it was reported today.

British model Elizabeth Hurley was well prepared for her nuptials with Indian businessman Arun Nayar, because her rollercoaster life has "anaesthetised" her to the pitfalls of marriage.

Elton John celebrated his 60th birthday with a host of celebrity friends, including Michael Stipe, Pierce Brosnan, Ozzy Osbourne and Bette Midler, at a New York City cathedral on Saturday night.

Environmental groups have condemned Elizabeth Hurley for producing the same amount of carbon emissions during her week-long wedding as the average British couple do in a decade.

One of Elizabeth Hurley's many wedding parties in India was shut down by police in the early hours of Wednesday morning after local residents complained about the noise.

The city of Jodhpur in western India is getting ready for the next leg of the wedding of Elizabeth Hurley and her new husband, Arun Nayar.

British actress Elizabeth Hurley and her new husband Arun Nayar kicked off their Indian wedding festivities with a private dinner party in the country’s financial capital Mumbai, news reports said today.

Elton John walked Elizabeth Hurley down the aisle for her church blessing with new husband Arun Nayar on Saturday.
